name: algebraically

in a way that relates to or uses algebra: Solve the equation algebraically. The first two equations are easy to prove algebraically. See
algebra
More examplesFewer examplesStudents will be expected to represent problem situations algebraically.If you tried to solve this problem algebraically it would take too much time. Pi is the most famous ratio in mathematics because when you try to calculate it algebraically it spits out an infinite and seemingly random series of digits.
